items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved!!
items.body: Very comfortable, the corset style back really snatches your waist in! Big chest friendly, for reference i wear size 8 pants & 36 DD and i ordered a size 6 in this dress. it‚Äôs really good high quality material i got tons of compliments!! i used this for engagement pictures. the seller is also very kind!! they reached out to me to see when i needed the dress by & they were able to ship it earlier than expected! so grateful!! Read more
items.author: Maiya

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous
items.body: Gorgeous dress. Slit was a little high, but nothing a safety pin couldn‚Äôt fix easily. Read more
items.author: Melissa Wyland

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy it!!!!
items.body: I emailed the shipper asking for speedy delivery because of the reviews and because I needed it for this weekend. THEY came through!!! Thank God! The dress is beautiful!!! It's excellent quality, PERFECT FIT, and follows the sizing chart. It has a slight stretch to it. I'm 5'3, 135 lbs, athletic, built with big boobs, and it looks so good! I highly recommend it! Read more
items.author: Katia V.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yes, to the dress!
items.body: I felt like the bell of the ball at the party. It‚Äôs perfect for women with smaller breasts and larger hips. Read more
items.author: Sandy Turner

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly recommend!
items.body: I love this dress! The seller even reached out to ask when my event was so they could have it delivered on time! I even received it a little earlier than the original date! The fabric is amazing, it fits me extremely well and the corset back? Its just an all around quality dress and I couldn't be more happy with it. For other women to know: I am 5 ft 4 in and weigh 175 and the large fits easily. Read more
items.author: jamie walko

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering
items.body: Beautiful dress for a wedding, it's really flattering Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Peach Colored Dress
items.body: It actually turned out to be a nice looking dress on my baby. Homecoming dress for my baby senior year. Size is perfect. Color was as pictured. Comfort was ok also. The only thing is that it is definitely not wrinkle resistant. Read more
items.author: Robin

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Mermaid Formal Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Mermaid Formal Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Floral Blush Pinkd, Floral Blush Pinkg, Floral Light Bluef, Olive Green, Fuchsia, Black, Champagne, Dusty Blue, Floral Champagneh, Floral Whitef, Peacock, Plum, Blush Pink, Royal Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
